name: Planet Suika
description:
Take your Suika stacking skills to a new planetary level in the Casual Puzzle Game Planet Suika! Combine smaller planets together to turn them into larger planets. Master the games Physics to combine the planets until you make a big Sun!

Play the Single Player mode and try to combine two suns. Make sure to combine planets covered in star dust to double your points, use the meteor showers to rack up a high score!
